smashy 0.0.0-9000
  • Reference

Density Estimation Prediction Object

Source: R/DensityPrediction.R
PredictionDensity.Rd

Predictions returned by LearnerDensity and evaluated by MeasureDensity.

See also

Other density estimation classes: LearnerDensity, MeasureDensity, TaskDensity, as_prediction_density(), as_task_density(), mlr_learners_density.featureless, mlr_learners_density.np, mlr_measures_density.logloss, mlr_tasks_faithful

Super class

mlr3::Prediction -> PredictionDensity

Active bindings

prob

(numeric)
Predicted density.

prob

(numeric)
Predicted log density.

Methods

Public methods

  • PredictionDensity$new()

Inherited methods
  • mlr3::Prediction$filter()
  • mlr3::Prediction$format()
  • mlr3::Prediction$help()
  • mlr3::Prediction$print()
  • mlr3::Prediction$score()

Method new()

Initialize the PredictionDensity object. One of prob or logprob must be given.

Usage

PredictionDensity$new(
  task = NULL,
  row_ids = mlr3::assert_task(task)$row_ids,
  prob = exp(logprob),
  logprob = log(prob),
  check = TRUE
)

Arguments

task

(TaskDensity)
TaskDensity for which prediction was made, used to extract defaults for row_ids.

row_ids

(integer)
Row ids of the predicted observations.

prob

(numeric)
Predicted density

logprob

(numeric)
Predicted log density.

check

(logical(1))
Whether to perform argument checks and predict type conversions.
